about_the_game:
A child refugee and their shadow try to survive across two planes of existence and multiple universes.

In this 3D puzzle platformer, cast physically interactable shadows to create your own platforms or remove obstacles, while traveling between beautiful, yet unfamiliar universes and countries, using their unique environments and designs to solve challenging puzzles in unexpected ways.

But most importantly, find home.
